name: Just another generic: FPS
description:
The world is in peril. Several terrorist cells have been activated all around the world. You have been recruited to stop them. Use all the weapons and equipment at your disposal to eradicate these forces.

Customize your character to your liking, changing their kit, from the shirt that they wear to the pouches on their rig, change how your operator look. Utilize an extensive weapon customization system that gives you fine control on where to put your modules, grips, sights etc.

Play with the extensive character customization sandbox.
